title: URF Every weekend???
body:
1). Needs to be on EVERY WEEKEND(Friday, Sataday & Sunday), this game mode is the future of Leauge
2). If RIOT only plan to bring URF out a couple of times a year then i am mildly disappointed 
3). only takes 5-15 secs to find a game because its that popular of a game mode 
please RIOT listen to the people {{champion:86}} {{item:3901}}

replies.body: Bring back one of the most overhyped game modes? There are much better candidates to be brought back than URF.

Kind of agree with it as a whole, Urf is fun. But give it some time. If you managed to clock up a good 30-50 URFS over the weekend, by game 15, you noticed that it was usually a pool of 20champs being picked. It's fun, but it needs breathing space. 

Though i feel it should be a mode in custom games, just not regular. People could still play it amongst friends if they want for the minimal IP. But, i think the constant urge to play would detract from LoL as a whole, i know regular modes were alot more interesting on monday as i made so many mistakes due to being in URF brain.

Oh dear lord, please, no.

It was fun for one night. After that, it got tedious and too much of a 'Cluster f...'

I can see the appeal for a break from being 'competitive' but i personally believe it brings out the worst in most players. I saw more Salt in URF than I have in a long time from norms or even bronze (Yes, My division).

> If RIOT only plan to bring URF out a couple of times a year then i am mildly disappointed

It's *more* than "a couple times a year". With the current rotation of Ascension, LotPK, URF and OFA we'll get it once every 4 weeks, which would be a total of 13 times over the course of a year. Considering Riots estimate that each rotation will take 1.5-2 months (rather, 6-8 weeks) we'll be seeing URF between 6-9 times in any given year. Considering we not only get URF but a variety of other featured game modes *on a regular basis*, I think you need to stop asking for more. Riot didn't have to do this much.
